title: Increased Lags and Disconnects
body: So I don't know if it's just I'm unlucky or coincidence but lately I've noticed that there has been a large increase of players lagging or disconnecting lately. I'm just starting to wonder if there's something wrong with the severs and not just my internet. Or if I'm just getting unlucky but still I've never had these problems so badly until just a few days ago and it hasn't gotten better. I've turned my all us my devices that use Wifi off as well as trying to connect to the Ethernet and turning all the graphic settings to the lowest they go and still I have problems. Every game my MS is good and fine for a few minutes then starts spiking up and down randomly to as high as 5000 then just drops as suddenly as it rose. And I'm not the only one who has had this problem lately. Lots of other players I play with have it worse as disconnecting twice or thrice a game.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any record of issues with the NA servers, but I have noticed a trend of ISP routing issues lately. One of the biggest was Charter, who recently reached out and expect their issues to be resolved by now.

From your description, it really sounds like there may be temperamental issues along your route to the server, so a good place to start is by first ensuring your local network settings are up to spec with our [network guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if your issue persists after taking those steps.
